message: Let's be reasonable, Bob.  Take this deal while it's still good!
I think a 60/40 split is fair, considering the value of the money decreases each round.  Let's make this quick.
The clock is ticking, Bob.  My offer's still on the table, but it won't last forever!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better deal than that. Let's split it 70/30, I think that's a fair compromise.
This is my final offer, Bob.  Take it or leave it.
